## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Integration tests pass

### Security (PCI-DSS Compliance)
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords, PII) is logged or exposed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented for all user inputs
- [ ] No SQL injection, XSS, or other OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Dependencies have been checked for known vulnerabilities
- [ ] Authentication/authorization changes have been reviewed

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG if applicable

### Observability
- [ ] Appropriate logging has been added (without sensitive data)
- [ ] Metrics are exposed for new functionality
- [ ] Trace spans are properly named and attributed
